QuestData.Title: Buried History
QuestData.Description:
Since the Amathet came from this region, it would only stand to reason that artifacts from their civilization would be left behind here, hidden beneath the sands.
It looks like it's time for a good old-fashioned dig!
The dunes near here must have covered up a large swath of the Amathet's former territory. Let's see what we can dig up there!
QuestData.LogDescription: Uncover and collect $1oa Amathet Artifacts in Uldum.
